title: internal compiler error: no warnings or errors encountered even though `delayed_good_path_bugs` issued

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code This triggers on CI on Linux; I don't have a Linux to try a repro: ``` git clone https://github.com/djeedai/bevy_hanabi.git git checkout 44ed04bd77d2a9eab8622b6c01d9cb906980bc49 cargo test --no-default-features --features 2d ``` ### Meta https://github.com/djeedai/bevy_hanabi/actions/runs/3168209195/jobs/5159251886#step:4:47 ``` /home/runner/.cargo/bin/rustc -V rustc 1.66.0-nightly (57f097ea2 2022-10-01) /home/runner/.cargo/bin/cargo -V cargo 1.66.0-nightly (f5fed93ba 2022-09-27) /home/runner/.cargo/bin/rustup -V rustup 1.25.1 (bb60b1e89 2022-07-12) info: This is the version for the rustup toolchain manager, not the rustc compiler. info: The currently active `rustc` version is `rustc 1.66.0-nightly (57f097ea2 2022-10-01)` ``` https://github.com/djeedai/bevy_hanabi/actions/runs/3168209195/jobs/5159251886#step:7:311 ``` note: rustc 1.66.0-nightly (57f097ea2 2022-10-01) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 ``` ### Error output https://github.com/djeedai/bevy_hanabi/actions/runs/3168209195/jobs/5159251886 ``` error: internal compiler error: no warnings or errors encountered even though `delayed_good_path_bugs` issued error: internal compiler error: trimmed_def_paths constructed ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1536:13 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f676f414380 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h80b67585f93dcdfa at /rustc/57f097ea25f2c05f424fc9b9dc50dbd6d399845c/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 1: 0x7f676f414380 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h1727d1d942e500b9 at /rustc/57f097ea25f2c05f424fc9b9dc50dbd6d399845c/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7f676f414380 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h1d58d8daeea91706 at /rustc/57f097ea25f2c05f424fc9b9dc50dbd6d399845c/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:66:5 3: 0x7f676f414380 -
